name: Susan Sherayko
what_you_do: Susan Sherayko is an author, coach, and speaker who helps people transform their lives using a creative thought process and daily prescription for success.
who_you_serve: People seeking to rebuild their lives and move from disaster to prosperity.
social_proof: Executive in Charge of Production and Emmy nominated Line Producer for 'Home and Family' on Hallmark Channel; Author of 'Rainbows Over Ruins'
signature_programs: Rainbows Over Ruins (book); 'Rebuilding Your Life: Moving from Disaster to Prosperity' (podcast)
business_focus: Helping individuals transform their lives through creative thinking, spirituality, and a structured success framework.
